participants.committee_id: ~{"name": "Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V"}

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Monday, February 11, 2019 PLACE: JHR 140 CHAIR: Rep. Oscar Longoria The subcommittee on Articles I, IV, and V will meet to hear testimony on House Budget recommendations for the following agencies: · Secretary of State · Office of the Governor & Trusteed Programs · Commission on the Arts · Commission on State Emergency Communications · Texas Facilities Commission and Revenue Bonds for Lease Payments · Texas Public Finance Authority and General Obligation Bond Debt Service · Texas Historical Commission · Employee Retirement System and Social Security and Benefit Replacement Pay · Pension Review Board · Texas Emergency Services Retirement System · Bond Review Board Public testimony will be taken and may be limited to five minutes. Agenda items not considered during this hearing may be carried over to a future schedule. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
